Bash(git -C "C:/Users/erik.richter/Desktop/MosaicTools" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
v2.3.0: Gender check, impression auto-hide, clinical history fixes

- Add gender check feature: warns when report contains terms impossible for patient''s gender \(e.g., prostate in female patient\)
- Blinking red warning replaces clinical history box when gender mismatch detected
- Hide impression window automatically on study change or when no study open
- Fix clinical history extraction cutting off at "Reason for exam:" 
- Fix clinical history box staying dark red after gender warning cleared
- Add Gender Check checkbox in Advanced settings

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash("C:/Users/erik.richter/Desktop/GH CLI/gh.exe" release create v2.3.0 "C:/Users/erik.richter/Desktop/MosaicTools/MosaicToolsCSharp/bin/Release/net8.0-windows10.0.19041.0/win-x64/publish/MosaicTools.exe" --title "v2.3.0" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## What''s New

- **Gender Check**: New feature that warns when a report contains anatomical terms impossible for the patient''s gender \(e.g., "prostate" for a female patient, "uterus" for a male patient\)
  - Blinking red warning replaces the clinical history box when mismatch detected
  - Shows patient gender and the offending terms
  - Enable in Advanced settings under "Gender Check"

- **Impression Auto-Hide**: Impression window now automatically hides when switching to a new study or when no study is open \(fixes issue when signing via Mosaic button instead of keyboard/mic\)

- **Clinical History Fixes**:
  - Fixed extraction cutting off at "Reason for exam:" text
  - Fixed clinical history box staying dark red after gender warning cleared

## Settings

New checkbox in Advanced tab: **Gender Check** - Warn if report has terms that don''t match patient gender.
EOF
\)" --repo erichter2018/MosaicTools)
Bash(wmic process where "name like ''%Mosaic%''" get ExecutablePath)

Bash("C:\\Users\\erik.richter\\Desktop\\GH CLI\\gh.exe" release create v2.4.0 "C:\\Users\\erik.richter\\Desktop\\MosaicTools\\MosaicToolsCSharp\\bin\\Release\\net8.0-windows10.0.19041.0\\win-x64\\publish\\MosaicTools.exe" --title "v2.4.0" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## What''s New

### Macros Feature
- Auto-insert text snippets when new studies open in Mosaic
- Configure criteria: Required \(all must match\), Any of \(at least one\), Exclude \(none must match\)
- Waits for clinical history to be visible before inserting \(handles Mosaic auto-process edge case\)

### Clinical History Improvements
- Fixed double-paste issue by tracking auto-fix by accession number
- Fixed manual paste \(click\) using wrong clipboard content \(STA thread fix\)

### Other
- Get Prior now adds line break before comparison paste
- Settings: Enabling Macros automatically enables Scrape Mosaic
EOF
\)")
